description: From road +‎ runner, probably a calque of Spanish correcaminos (“roadrunner”), from correr (“to run”) + caminos (“roads”).

entries.meaning: Either of two species of fast-running bird in the genus Geococcyx of the cuckoo family native to North and Central America, the lesser roadrunner (Geococcyx velox) and, especially, the greater roadrunner (Geococcyx californianus).
examples: Synonyms: chaparral bird, chaparral cock, (Southwestern US) chaparral hen, paisano
